title: What happened to Tristana
body: I just realized she currently has the lowest win rates of ADCs. What happened? Everything about her kit is sold. Nothing especially spectacular, but nothing useless either. Great range, great steroid, great escape. What makes her less than viable?

replies.body:
Riot gutted her with that "rework".

Oh look at me I'm trist with my mage level AS per level! But I'm an ADC!

Well they decided to nerf her passive and built in attack speed.

Tristana was the first ADC I ever learned, and I will never forgive them for even entertaining such options.
Shes  pretty fun with her new e making her kit feel whole imo, but as somebody before me said, shes too much in the middle of "am i a mage or am i an ADC?"

Because Dash > Jump (Dam assasins)
Don't have THAT great of a range until lvl 17-18, people can bully that.
Only have two CC, and not that great (Well, the Ult is good for self peeling), one you have to go Mele to make'it (Jumo Slow), and as an adc... that's a bad idea.

And... well, she's not popular, is my favourite adc, but she's not in the meta.


But ya know how this work, This champ is bad 
*Apears in LCS*
OMG OP nerf plz. (S3 Corki)
They also recently needed her passive and q, which contributes.

Her attack speed is horrendous, her range isn't that great, and too much of her power is conditional on her unreliable E.  Top that off with being the squishiest ADC and high cooldowns, and she is basically useless.

Laning phase & waveclear probably.

Infinity edge was nerfed to force ADCs / who can afford to / switch from statik shiv to phantom dancer. 

Trist liked using statik shiv, her passive isn't that good.

I'm not sure if this is correct, this is only a speculation from latest trends.

When graves was played again, he bullied her out I guess.
